title: (x) Viva Magazine typefaces - Gill Sans, Chaparral {Lex, Pieter}
content:
Looking for the typefaces used in the spread attached.  
Header, Deck, Subs and body.  
file info: Scan of Viva Magazine interior spread. P.82 of vol 3 no 3.

Hope it’s available for purchase.  
Ps. Love this forum, I lurk here everyday!

Cheers, and have a fontastique summer.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Vive\_page.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821161723/http:/typophile.com/files/Vive_page.jpg) | 555.87 KB |

 [‹ (x) Heavy slab on "The Departed" promo poster - Aachen {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821161723/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34606 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Imarex & Nena logos - Gadget, Bank Gothic, Serpentine {Lari, Yves, Jan E} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821161723/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34570 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Mac_Designer

comments.content:
The subheads look like Gill sans, the rest (other than that script) look like the same font.

Don’t know what it is, but it’s not set very well (dumb quotes, lack of em dashes, etc.)

- Lex

Thanks,  
Yeah I’ll make sure to put some extra tender love and care when setting this in the project I have in mind for. 250+page mag :(

Thanks again guys. Fast and Good!
PS Chapparal may come bundled with your existing Adobe Creative Suite package. You may not need to buy another license.
